articles.content: Win and Thursday take an emotional farewell of their house as Morse, on his way to choir rehearsal at Blenheim Palace, stops by to take Thursday out for a farewell beer, and Sam, now sober, announces… [+1759 chars]

articles.author: Lester Fabian Brathwaite
articles.title: Abigail Breslin remembers her 'Little Miss Sunshine' costar Alan Arkin - Entertainment Weekly News
articles.description: Both Arkin and Breslin earned Oscar nominations for their roles in the 2006 dark comedy, with Arkin winning Best Supporting Actor.
articles.content:
Abigail Breslin is remembering her onscreen grandpa Alan Arkin, who died June 30 at age 89.
Breslin, 27, and Arkin starred in the 2006 dark comedy Little Miss Sunshine as part of a dysfunctional fam… [+1328 chars]
